DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: H3_alignment
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Alignment of 109 nucleotide sequences of nuclear gene histone H3, partial cds, from amphipods in genus Niphargus. All sequences were the same length and were aligned using a simple alghoritm (Geneious alignment).
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: amphipods
biodiversity metrics

conservation biology
